TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsImage extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage>類別具有公用建構函式。
使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A>新增映像，並取得它的參考新的文件中的方法。
使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A>方法，以取得現有文件中的影像參考。
根據設定的<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>，排清作業的<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage>類別可能會延遲到完整<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>已關閉。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何新增至映像<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]
